document.heading: Nurse Staffing Agency Amendment Act of 2018
To amend the Nurse Staffing Agency Act of 2003 to clarify that a business that offers only a registry of nursing personnel for employment is not required to be licensed as a nurse staffing agency.

history.summary: BILL SUMMARY - As introduced, this bill amends the Nurse Staffing Agency Act of 2003 to clarify the Department of Health does not require a nurse staffing agency license for businesses that only offer an employee nurse staffing registry. It preserves the status of businesses that operate in the District without a nurse staffing agency license that offer only a hiring registry.

document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Nurse Staffing Agency Amendment Act of 2018".
